title: Mashvisor can help your real estate portfolio in 2024 with this $199.99 subscription deal
content:
Macworld

If you’re feeling like you aren’t making enough money to make ends meet, join the club. In fact, 40% of Americans say they’re already stressed about their 2024 financial situation, according to a Fidelity study.

You can start generating more income and stabilizing your future as a real estate investor with the help of a lifetime subscription to a Mashvisor Professional Plan. 

Mashvisor simplifies months of research into real estate properties into just a handful of minutes for investors. By entering a city’s name into Mashvisor’s interactive map, users can access data and analytics on all the available rental properties in a given area. 

The platform analyzes information from public records, Zillow, Realtor.com, Auction.com, and other trusted sources to evaluate the profitability of various property types, helping members decide which real estate investments could turn the tidiest profit as a rental unit.

Through Mashvisor’s user-friendly interface, members can identify properties with low sale prices and high rental potential, allowing them to make informed offers quickly before other buyers swoop in. 

With a Professional Plan subscription, users also get some added features over standard members, including extra filters for finding multifamily and foreclosure properties, as well as up to 60 exported searches into an Excel spreadsheet each month.

A Mashvisor Pro Plan lifetime subscription is a nearly $3,600 value, but as part of this year-end blowout sale, a lifetime of access to all of Mashvisor’s real estate tools is now only $199.99. That price is only good until this sale ends at 11:59 p.m. PT on New Year’s Day, Jan. 1.

 

Mashvisor: Lifetime Subscription (Professional Plan) – $199.99

Get it now for $199.99

Prices subject to change
